title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin points out the big mistake Kevin Durant made when he joined the Nets and why it's coming back to hurt him now. He believes LeBron James is working on a masterplan to compete for more titles and add to his legacy. He looks at tonight's NBA draft and why betting on a player's upside is the best route in today's NBA. Plus, basketball analyst Jeff Goodman joins the show to breakdown the top prospects in the NBA draft and what makes having Kyrie Irving on your team so difficult. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
